overview: Mike Donnell has been leading public and private wireless, telecommunications and software businesses for over 20 years. Donnell joins Sutus after having most recently led New Global Telecom (NGT), a VoIP services provider, as its CEO. Prior to NGT at Cellular One (San Francisco), Mr. Donnell served as President and CEO and led the company in its successful sale to AT&T Wireless. Under his leadership, the company was recognized for its network quality and customer service excellence and for achieving the best combined growth and profitability in the industry. He also served as President and CEO of ZI Corporation (NASDQ: ZICA) a software development company specializing in mobile phone software. Earlier in his career, Mr. Donnell served as the Regional President for PageNet’s Western Region during which time the company grew to become the largest paging company in the world.
